Resource Profile: openIMIS Bill

Official URL: https://github.com/openimis/openimis_fhir_r5_ig/StructureDefinition/openimis-invoice-bill Version: 0.1.0
Draft as of 2025-08-26 Computable Name: OpenIMISBill

Defines an Bill for openIMIS.

Usages:

  • Refer to this Profile: openIMIS Payment Notice
  • CapabilityStatements using this Profile: openIMIS Capability Statement
